---
title: "Contact"
output: html_document
---

If you want to reach out to me please complete this form and I'll get back to you ASAP!

<form role="form">
<div class="form-group">
<input name="name" id="name" placeholder="Name" class="form-control" type="text">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<input name="email" id="email" placeholder="Email" class="form-control" type="email">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<input name="subject" id="subject" placeholder="Subject" class="form-control" type="text">
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<textarea name="message" id="message" placeholder="Message" class="form-control" rows="3" cols="20"></textarea>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
<input value="Sell your soul to me" class="form-control" type="submit">
</div>
</form>
